name: DreamLand
storyline: The storyline begin at Another World. “Astral Spirit” summon player to an Astral Portal because of his ability of super spirits. Astral Spirit needs player’s special ability to help him find the missing Cosmic Energy Core, by solving the crisis of the world. Thus, our protagonist begins his journey.
summary: “DreamLand” is an immersive VR game, made by AAA team base on htcVIVE with Unreal Engine. With the VR device, the player could pass through the Portal of Astral Spirit, and explore the mystical dreamland by time travel. In this journey, the player can identify the secret of the ancient civilization via solving puzzles, which make the player immerse in a fantastical experience of audio and visual.
